title: Vintage Mechanical Watch, 1970s
description: A classic automatic timepiece with a leather strap, fully restored and in excellent working condition.

title: Signed First Edition Novel
description: A rare first printing of a renowned fantasy novel, signed by the author on the title page.

title: Abstract Oil Painting (48x36)
description: A large, vibrant contemporary oil painting on canvas by an emerging artist. Perfect for a modern interior.

title: Retro Gaming Console Bundle
description: Original 16-bit console complete with two controllers and five classic cartridge games. Tested and fully functional.

title: Limited Edition Sneaker Set
description: Unworn, deadstock pair of highly sought-after collaboration sneakers, size 10.

title: Antique Silver Tea Set (5-piece)
description: A beautiful early 20th-century sterling silver tea and coffee service, includes teapot, creamer, and sugar bowl.
